00030 ConstraintDistance::ConstraintDistance( Node* a_in, Node* b_in, double& alpha_in, std::string& method_in )
00031   : Constraint(alpha_in, method_in)
00032 {
00033   nodes.push_back( a_in );
00034   nodes.push_back( b_in );
00035 //   ro =  std::pow( nodes[1]->getx() - nodes[0]->getx(), 2 )
00036 //       + std::pow( nodes[1]->gety() - nodes[0]->gety(), 2 )
00037 //       + std::pow( nodes[1]->getz() - nodes[0]->getz(), 2 );
00038 
00039   ro = std::sqrt( std::pow( nodes[1]->getx() - nodes[0]->getx(), 2 )
00040                 + std::pow( nodes[1]->gety() - nodes[0]->gety(), 2 )
00041                 + std::pow( nodes[1]->getz() - nodes[0]->getz(), 2 ) );
00042 
00043 //   cout<< "\nro: " << ro
00044 //       << " = (" <<  nodes[1]->getx() << " - " << nodes[0]->getx() << ")^2"
00045 //       << " + (" <<  nodes[1]->gety() << " - " << nodes[0]->gety() << ")^2"
00046 //       << " + (" <<  nodes[1]->getz() << " - " << nodes[0]->getz() << ")^2"
00047 //       << endl;
00048 
00049   this->stiffnessMatrix.resize(2*dim,2*dim);
00050   this->internalForces.resize(2*dim);
00051   this->lambda.resize(1);
00052   this->lambda[0]=0.0;
00053   this->phi.resize(1);
00054   this->phi_q.resize(1);
00055   this->phi_q[0].resize(2*dim);
00056   this->phi_qq.resize(1);
00057   this->phi_qq[0].resize(2*dim,2*dim);
00058 }

00062 }

00064 void ConstraintDistance::calcPhi()
00065 {
00066 //   rt =  std::pow( nodes[1]->getx() - nodes[0]->getx(), 2 )
00067 //       + std::pow( nodes[1]->gety() - nodes[0]->gety(), 2 )
00068 //       + std::pow( nodes[1]->getz() - nodes[0]->getz(), 2 );
00069 // 
00070 //   this->phi[0] = rt - ro ;
00071 
00072   rt = std::sqrt( std::pow( nodes[1]->getx() - nodes[0]->getx(), 2 )
00073                 + std::pow( nodes[1]->gety() - nodes[0]->gety(), 2 )
00074                 + std::pow( nodes[1]->getz() - nodes[0]->getz(), 2 ) );
00075 
00076   this->phi[0] = rt*rt - ro*ro ;
00077 
00078 //   cout<< "\tro: " << ro << endl;
00079 //   cout<< "\tphi: " << phi[0] << endl;
00080 //   cout<< "\trt: " << rt
00081 //       << " = (" <<  nodes[1]->getx() << " - " << nodes[0]->getx() << ")^2"
00082 //       << " + (" <<  nodes[1]->gety() << " - " << nodes[0]->gety() << ")^2"
00083 //       << " + (" <<  nodes[1]->getz() << " - " << nodes[0]->getz() << ")^2"
00084 //       << endl;
00085 
00086 }
00087 
00088 void ConstraintDistance::calcPhiq()
00089 {
00090   this->phi_q[0](0) = -2.0*( nodes[1]->getx() - nodes[0]->getx() ) ;
00091   this->phi_q[0](1) = -2.0*( nodes[1]->gety() - nodes[0]->gety() ) ;
00092   if (dim == 3)
00093     this->phi_q[0](2) = -2.0*( nodes[1]->getz() - nodes[0]->getz() ) ;
00094   this->phi_q[0](dim) = +2.0*( nodes[1]->getx() - nodes[0]->getx() ) ;
00095   this->phi_q[0](dim+1) = +2.0*( nodes[1]->gety() - nodes[0]->gety() ) ;
00096   if (dim == 3)
00097     this->phi_q[0](dim+2) = +2.0*( nodes[1]->getz() - nodes[0]->getz() ) ;
00098 }
00099 
00100 void ConstraintDistance::calcPhiqq()
00101 {
00102   this->phi_qq[0](0,0) =  2.0 ;
00103   this->phi_qq[0](1,1) =  2.0 ;
00104   this->phi_qq[0](dim,dim) =  2.0 ;
00105   this->phi_qq[0](dim+1,dim+1) =  2.0 ;
00106   this->phi_qq[0](0,dim) = -2.0 ;
00107   this->phi_qq[0](dim,0) = -2.0 ;
00108   this->phi_qq[0](1,dim+1) = -2.0 ;
00109   this->phi_qq[0](dim+1,1) = -2.0 ;
00110   if (dim == 3){
00111     this->phi_qq[0](2,2) =  2.0 ;
00112     this->phi_qq[0](2,dim+2) = -2.0 ;
00113     this->phi_qq[0](dim+2,2) = -2.0 ;
00114     this->phi_qq[0](dim+2,dim+2) =  2.0 ;
00115   }
00116 }

00118 }
